title: The constructed built up amenity along with plot to be handed over to MCGM under AR shall have structural provisions for vertical extension in order to consume additional FSI permissible as per provisions of these Regulations in future
clause_text: The constructed built up amenity along with plot to be handed over to MCGM under AR shall have structural provisions for vertical extension in order to consume additional FSI permissible as per provisions of these Regulations in future.
